scripts.all: lerna bootstrap --hoist && npm run-script clean && npm run-script lint && npm run-script build && npm run-script test
scripts.ci: lerna bootstrap --hoist && npm run-script clean && npm run-script lint && npm run-script build && npm run-script test
scripts.update: for d in ./packages/*; do npm-check-updates -i --packageFile $d/package.json; done
scripts.heroku-cleanup: rm -rf .jdk node_modules/git-cz node_modules/canvas/ node_modules/@commitlint node_modules/@types* node_modules/webpack node_modules/@lerna node_modules/@octokit/plugin-enterprise-rest node_modules/node-plantuml node_modules/cucumber node_modules/eslint node_modules/commitizen && du -h  -t 20M . | sort -hr
